Title: What Kind of Bad?
Writer: George Pelecanos (created by), David Simon (created by), Richard Price (story by), Will Ralston (teleplay by), Chris Yakaitis (teleplay by)
Actors: James Franco, Maggie Gyllenhaal, Gbenga Akinnagbe, Chris Bauer
Plot: Bobby tries to change Vincent's mind about Rudy's offer; Darlene returns from a trip home with a new girl; Candy contemplates a change of careers; Paul explores the underbelly of gay life in the city; Sandra scores a key interview.
